channel.title: Demoes on Demo Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Demoes on Demo Hugo Site

item.title: Badge
item.description: Table of definitions The visual appearance is set using one of the following classes: pf-badge-new, pf-badge-sale, pf-badge-fav, or pf-badge-promo Class Description pf-badge The default internal sizing and structure of the badge. The default badge text colour is white. pf-badge-secondary Changes the default shape from circular to a pill-shape. aria-label The aria-label attribute by default provides a description for screenreaders, this attribute is also referenced in CSS to display use the same attribute as the badge label text.

item.title: Accordion
item.description: Benefits Absorbs quickly and keeps skin hydrated, nourished and soft  High in anti-oxidants, vitamins A,B,C,E, Omega 3,6,7 and 9 Key Ingredients Cold pressed virgin coconut oil, macadamia, dilo and sikeci oil. Passionflower extracts and fresh coconut milk. How to Use As a body moisturiser or for extra dry areas. Also an excellent cream to help prevent stretch marks during pregnancy.
